theEphemeral:FrozenEye.NAME: Frozen Eye
theEphemeral:FrozenEye.FLAVOR: Staring into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

theEphemeral:CultistMask.NAME: Cultist Headpiece
DESCRIPTIONS: You know the secrets of the cult. Gain 1 Ritual at the start of combat.

theEphemeral:Laurel.NAME: Laurel
theEphemeral:Laurel.FLAVOR: A bay laurel used in prophetic rituals.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 #ytheephemeral:Augury at the start of combat.

theEphemeral:Pincushion.NAME: Pincushion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #ytheephemeral:Fleeting_Thought to your hand at the start of combat.

theEphemeral:LinenVeil.NAME: Linen Veil
theEphemeral:LinenVeil.FLAVOR: The diaphanous weave would be almost see-through... if you had sight.
DESCRIPTIONS: While the top card of your draw pile is an #yAttack, gain #b2 #yStrength. While the top card of your draw pile is a #ySkill, gain #b2 #yDexterity.

theEphemeral:RitualAsh.NAME: Ritual Ash
theEphemeral:RitualAsh.FLAVOR: The remains of a burnt offering used to anoint a seer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust an #yEthereal card, deal #b3 damage to a random enemy.

theEphemeral:GlowingFeather.NAME: Glowing Feather
theEphemeral:GlowingFeather.FLAVOR: A feather that glows with an eerie light.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yPower card you play each combat costs #b0.

theEphemeral:CuriousTalon.NAME: Curious Talon
theEphemeral:CuriousTalon.FLAVOR: The presence of this broken claw fills you with an indescribable rage.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower card, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theEphemeral:HookAndYarn.NAME: Hook and Yarn
theEphemeral:HookAndYarn.FLAVOR: The magic of this yarn knits a mystical barrier around you.

theEphemeral:Pomegranate.NAME: Pomegranate
theEphemeral:Pomegranate.FLAVOR: The fruit of the ancient gods and goddesses, fresh and juicy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b21.

theEphemeral:AncientScroll.NAME: Ancient Scroll
theEphemeral:AncientScroll.FLAVOR: The runes inscribed here curse you without even being read.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, obtain #b2 #rWrithe #rCurses.

theEphemeral:Basin.NAME: Basin
theEphemeral:Basin.FLAVOR: The pure water contained in this basin leaves you feeling cleansed, inside and out.

theEphemeral:StoneTablet.NAME: Stone Tablet
theEphemeral:StoneTablet.FLAVOR: The tally marks scratched into the surface indicate this tablet was used for some sort of accounting.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies.
